content: meet the **frogging friend** your loyal companion through the highs and lows of your crochet journey designed by marly bird this adorable amigurumi frog is not just a delightful project to work on but also a heartwarming buddy to accompany you as you unravel those rare mistakes or frog your work and celebrate the joys of crafting crafted to perch charmingly by your side the frogging friend sits approximately 7 inches tall from his seated position to the tip of his wide watchful eyes his endearing smile and big bright eyes make for a whimsical addition to any crafting corner adding a touch of fun and comfort to your creative space this easy-to-follow amigurumi pattern is perfect for beginners ensuring a satisfying experience for crocheters of all levels with only four colors of basic worsted weight yarn a 3 5mm crochet hook and some poly-fill stuffing you can bring this cute critter to life the assembly is a breeze with a tapestry needle and each stitch is an opportunity to pour a little love into your new froggy friend whether you re in need of moral support after a crocheting mishap or just want a cute companion while you stitch away the frogging friend is there to share every moment it s not just a pattern it s a journey to creating a keepsake that will hop right into your heart ideal for personal keepsakes or thoughtful gifts the frogging friend is ready to leap from your imagination into reality hop to it and create your very own with this beginner-friendly pattern available now on ravelry and etsy bring some joy and a smile to your crochet adventures with the frogging friend by your side
